title: Nilavu Paatu Lyrics Kannukul Nilavu
stanzas:
<div>
Nilavu Paatu Song Lyrics Kannukul Nilavu

Nilavu pattu nilavu pattu
or naal kaetten
moongil kaattil moongil kaattil
naalum padithaen. (3)

andha isaiyin ragasiyam
iru uyirukku purindhathu
iru uyirukku purindhathu
ingu yaarukku therinthadhu

isaiyil kalandhu
midhakkum thendralae
isaiyin magalai
paarthathillaiyo

Nilavu pattu nilavu pattu
or naal kaetten
moongil kaattil moongil kaattil
naalum padithaen

kanavugal varuvadhu
vizhigalin viruppamaa
kavidhaigal varuvadhu
kavigyanin viruppamaa

kuyilgalin iruppidam
isaiyaal ariyalaam.
malarndhidum malargalai
vaasanai sollalaam

kuyilgalum malargalum
adhisayam kanavugal
kavithaigal ragasiyam.

Nilavu pattu nilavu pattu
or naal kaetten
moongil kaattil moongil kaattil
naalum padithaen

nilavondru nadanthathu
suvadugal manadhile.
mazhai vandhu nanaithathu
isai alai seviyilae.

kolusugal keerthanai
yaar andha devathai.
vizhigalil virigiraal
yaar andha thaamarai.

idhu oru pudhuvidha
paravasam
mayangudhu isai ennum
adhisiyam.

Nilavu pattu nilavu pattu
or naal kaetten
moongil kaattil moongil kaattil
naalum padithaen.

andha isaiyin ragasiyam
iru uyirukku purindhathu
iru uyirukku purindhathu
ingu yaarukku therinthadhu

isaiyil kalandhu
midhakkum thendralae
isaiyin magalai
paarthathillaiyo

Nilavu pattu nilavu pattu
or naal kaetten
moongil kaattil moongil kaattil
naalum padithaen
